replies.body: He's not that broken to be honest, just annoying. Also i don't think the yasuos in your elo range can play him that well.
what do you mean in my elo range?

> [{quoted}](name=ciaô,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lqBYWlbZ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-12-05T03:03:48.830+0000)
>
> what do you mean in my elo range?

In your rank people who play Yasuo tend to not understand the champion compared to someone in a higher elo such as Diamond or higher.
lmao my rank? im only this rank coz noobs! im a plat player! all my mates diamond and i only play with them

> [{quoted}](name=ciaô,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lqBYWlbZ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-12-05T03:03:48.830+0000)
>
> what do you mean in my elo range?

you are bronze 2 meaning you are mid bronze to low silver elo range.

> [{quoted}](name=gravityhacker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lqBYWlbZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-04T17:12:55.154+0000)
>
> He's not that broken to be honest, just annoying. Also i don't think the yasuos in your elo range can play him that well.

So, his kit is just too good, his windwall is just  a complete fuck you to anyone that has any sort of projectile attack, his dash gives him so much mobility and he can ult of others abilities. he gets double crit for pretty much no downside. lets face it 50% less isnt bad, especially when his core item is IE. i feel his kit is overloaded. he may not be OP per se, but he is annoying to face every second game

Please, what is with this low elo community saying that Yasuo is BROKEN?! He is not close to broken as he was post-release, he can be annoying and have good matchups but please, don't use the word broken without really knowing the true meaning
I mean I don't really have as much of an issue against yasou since I discovered veigar and sion, but I've heard plenty of higher elo players bitch about yasou.

When seeing Yas in their team, our team: GG (around 70% of possibility....)
When seeing Yas picked in Normal, especially instalocked in Normal or Ranked, our team: GG (xDDDDDD.....)

A bit beyond the exact situations but I think this would experienced by many players :))))))
